text: "I Could Not Ask for More" is a 1999 song by Edwin McCain and was used in the 1999 movie Message in a Bottle. It was also taken from his third studio album Messenger and went to number 37 in the United States and number 12 in Canada. It was covered by country singer Sara Evans for her third studio album Born to Fly and went to number 35 in the United States. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Sara Evans songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:Country pop songs
title: I Could Not Ask for More
